name: PT_CAREPLAN_DATE_AUDIT
description: This table contains audit trail information for occurrence code 29 - the date the physical therapy care plan was established or last reviewed.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the summary block record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PT_CAREPLAN_HX_DATE
columns.description: This audit trail item stores past values of the date the physical therapy care plan was established or last reviewed.

columns.name: PT_CAREPLAN_USER_ID
columns.description: This audit trail item stores users who changed the value of the date the physical therapy care plan was established or last reviewed.

columns.name: PT_CAREPLAN_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: PT_CAREPLAN_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: This audit trail item stores the instant users changed the value of the date the physical therapy care plan was established or last reviewed.
